```{r = silent}
rm(list=ls())
library(ggdag)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_dag())


```

```{r}
dagify(
  Y ~ X1,
  Y ~ X2,
  Y ~ uY,
  X1 ~ uX1,
  X2 ~ uX2,
  uY ~ h,
  uX1 ~ h,
  uX2 ~ h
  )%>%
  ggdag()

```
